verses.verse: In thee <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, do I take refuge <S%H2620><s%>: Let me never <S%H408><s%> be put to shame <S%H954><s%>.
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me in thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, and rescue <S%H6403><s%> me <S%H5186><s%>: Bow down thine ear <S%H241><s%> unto me <S%H3467><s%>, and save me.

Be thou to me a rock <S%H6697><s%> of habitation <S%H4583><s%>, whereunto I may continually <S%H8548><s%> resort <S%H935><s%>: Thou hast given commandment <S%H6680><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> me <S%H5553><s%>; For thou art my rock and my fortress <S%H4686><s%>.
Rescue <S%H6403><s%> me <S%H430><s%>, O my God, out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, Out of the hand <S%H3709><s%> of the unrighteous <S%H5765><s%> and cruel man <S%H2556><s%>.
For thou art my hope <S%H8615><s%>, O Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Thou art my trust <S%H4009><s%> from my youth <S%H5271><s%>.

By thee have I been holden up <S%H5564><s%> from the womb <S%H990><s%>; Thou art he that took <S%H1491><s%> me out of my mother <S%H517><s%>'s bowels <S%H4578><s%>: My praise <S%H8416><s%> shall be continually of thee <S%H8548><s%>.
I am as a wonder <S%H4159><s%> unto many <S%H7227><s%>; But thou art my strong <S%H5797><s%> refuge <S%H4268><s%>.
My mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall be filled <S%H4390><s%> with thy praise <S%H8416><s%>, And with thy honor <S%H8597><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%>.
Cast me not off <S%H7993><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of old age <S%H2209><s%>; Forsake <S%H5800><s%> me not when my strength <S%H3581><s%> faileth <S%H3615><s%>.
For mine enemies <S%H341><s%> speak <S%H559><s%> concerning me <S%H8104><s%>; And they that watch for my soul <S%H5315><s%> take counsel <S%H3289><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>,
Saying <S%H559><s%>, God <S%H430><s%> hath forsaken <S%H5800><s%> him <S%H7291><s%>: Pursue and take <S%H8610><s%> him <S%H5337><s%>; For there is none to deliver.
O God <S%H430><s%>, be not far <S%H7368><s%> from me <S%H430><s%>; O my God, make haste <S%H2363><s%> to help me <S%H5833><s%>.

Let them be put to shame <S%H954><s%> and consumed <S%H3615><s%> that are adversaries <S%H7853><s%> to my soul <S%H5315><s%>; Let them be covered <S%H5844><s%> with reproach <S%H2781><s%> and dishonor <S%H3639><s%> that seek <S%H1245><s%> my hurt <S%H7451><s%>.
But I will hope <S%H3176><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>, And will praise <S%H8416><s%> thee yet more <S%H3254><s%> and more <S%H3254><s%>.

My mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall tell <S%H5608><s%> of thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, And of thy salvation <S%H8668><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%>; For I know <S%H3045><s%> not the numbers thereof <S%H5615><s%>.
I will come <S%H935><s%> with the mighty <S%H1369><s%> acts of the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: I will make mention <S%H2142><s%> of thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, even of thine only.
O God <S%H430><s%>, thou hast taught <S%H3925><s%> me from my youth <S%H5271><s%>; And hitherto have I declared <S%H5046><s%> thy wondrous works <S%H6381><s%>.

Yea <S%H5704><s%>, even when I am old <S%H2209><s%> and grayheaded <S%H7872><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, forsake <S%H5800><s%> me not <S%H5046><s%>, Until I have declared thy strength <S%H2220><s%> unto the next generation <S%H1755><s%>, Thy might <S%H1369><s%> to every one that is to come <S%H935><s%>.
Thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%> also <S%H430><s%>, O God, is very high <S%H4791><s%>; Thou who hast done <S%H6213><s%> great things <S%H1419><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, who is like unto thee?

Thou <S%H7200><s%>, who hast showed us many <S%H7227><s%> and sore <S%H7451><s%> troubles <S%H6869><s%>, Wilt quicken <S%H2421><s%> us again <S%H7725><s%>, And wilt bring us up <S%H5927><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> from the depths <S%H8415><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.
Increase <S%H7235><s%> thou my greatness <S%H1420><s%>, And turn again <S%H5437><s%> and comfort me <S%H5162><s%>.

I will also praise <S%H3034><s%> thee with the psaltery <S%H3627><s%>, Even thy truth <S%H571><s%>, O my God <S%H430><s%>: Unto thee will I sing <S%H2167><s%> praises with the harp <S%H3658><s%>, O thou Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
My lips <S%H8193><s%> shall shout for joy <S%H7442><s%> when I sing <S%H2167><s%> praises unto thee <S%H5315><s%>; And my soul, which thou hast redeemed <S%H6299><s%>.

My tongue <S%H3956><s%> also shall talk <S%H1897><s%> of thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%> long <S%H954><s%>; For they are put to shame, for they are confounded <S%H954><s%>, that seek <S%H1245><s%> my hurt <S%H7451><s%>.
